caption.p: Donut charts of the fraction of total uncertainty in extreme ( e) and mean ( f) precipitation changes explained by GCM (blue), RCM (brown) and RCP (green) uncertainties for ( a) winter, ( b) spring, ( c) summer and ( d) autumn over the Middle East region. T = 15 yr, T = 5 yr and T = 1 yr refer to extreme precipitation of 15-, 5- and 1-year return periods, respectively. ‘Mean’ corresponds to mean precipitation.
